title: How to Add Friends on Fortnite

steps.headline: Launch Fortnite.
steps.description: You can either launch Fortnite on your computer, phone, or tablet using the Epic Games launcher, or you can use your PS4, Xbox, or Switch.

steps.headline: Select a game mode.
steps.description: Choose to start a Save the World, Battle Royale, or Creative lobby. The options you need to access are only visible in a lobby.

steps.headline: Open your Friends panel.
steps.description: Computer, phone, or tablet: Click the human silhouettes icon. Xbox One: Press the View button, which looks like two boxes. Nintendo Switch: Press the - button. PS4: Press the touchpad button.

steps.headline: Select the Add Friends option.
steps.description:
You can click or tap this option if you're using a computer, phone, or tablet. On other platforms:
Xbox One: Press the X button. Nintendo Switch: Press the Y button. PS4: Press the square button.

steps.headline: Enter your friend's display name or email address.
steps.description: If you see your friend's name in the list of players you've played with recently, you can select their name from that list. Once the information is entered correctly, you'll see a message that says "Friend Request Sent."

steps.headline: Open the Epic Games launcher on your PC.
steps.description: The icon is black with Epic Games in the center. It can either be found on the desktop or by clicking on Start and searching for Epic Games in the search bar. If you don't have the Epic Games launcher, you can download it for free at https://www.epicgames.com/store/en-US/download.

steps.headline: Sign in to your Epic Games account.
steps.description: If you are already playing Fortnite, then you should already have an Epic Games account.

steps.headline: Click Friends.
steps.description: This is usually the fourth option in the menu on the left side of the page.

steps.headline: Select the Add Friends icon.
steps.description: It's the icon in the middle that looks like a human silhouette with a plus (+) sign.

steps.headline: Enter your friend's username or email address.
steps.description: You might need to click in the text box to activate it.

steps.headline: Click Send to send the request.
steps.description: The other player will need to log in to their Epic Games account to accept the friend request.

text:
Using Fortnite Launch Fortnite. You can either launch Fortnite on your computer, phone, or tablet using the Epic Games launcher, or you can use your PS4, Xbox, or Switch. Select a game mode. Choose to start a Save the World, Battle Royale, or Creative lobby. The options you need to access are only visible in a lobby. Open your Friends panel. Computer, phone, or tablet: Click the human silhouettes icon. Xbox One: Press the View button, which looks like two boxes. Nintendo Switch: Press the - button. PS4: Press the touchpad button. Select the Add Friends option. You can click or tap this option if you're using a computer, phone, or tablet. On other platforms:
Xbox One: Press the X button. Nintendo Switch: Press the Y button. PS4: Press the square button. Enter your friend's display name or email address. If you see your friend's name in the list of players you've played with recently, you can select their name from that list. Once the information is entered correctly, you'll see a message that says "Friend Request Sent." Using the Epic Games Launcher Open the Epic Games launcher on your PC. The icon is black with Epic Games in the center. It can either be found on the desktop or by clicking on Start and searching for Epic Games in the search bar. If you don't have the Epic Games launcher, you can download it for free at https://www.epicgames.com/store/en-US/download. Sign in to your Epic Games account. If you are already playing Fortnite, then you should already have an Epic Games account. Click Friends. This is usually the fourth option in the menu on the left side of the page. Select the Add Friends icon. It's the icon in the middle that looks like a human silhouette with a plus (+) sign. Enter your friend's username or email address. You might need to click in the text box to activate it. Click Send to send the request. The other player will need to log in to their Epic Games account to accept the friend request.
